definition: (old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: The Illinois stop was particularly important because of the primary calendar.
sentences.chinese: 鑑於初選日程安排，伊利諾伊州這一站尤顯重要。

sentences.english: Even so, any skunk captured in Illinois is euthanized.
sentences.chinese: 即使這樣，伊利諾伊州內捕獲的臭鼬均實施安樂死。

sentences.english: A city of east-central Illinois adjoining Champaign.
sentences.chinese: 烏爾班納伊利諾伊州中東部的城市，臨近尚佩恩。

sentences.english: Today, she is a middle-school teacher in Wheeling, Ill.
sentences.chinese: 現在，她是伊利諾伊州威爾梅特一所中學的教師。

sentences.english: Cahokia, in the present state of Illinois, was the largest.
sentences.chinese: 位於現在伊利諾伊州的卡霍基亞是其中最大的一個。

sentences.english: and talked to plant workers at a seed distributor in Atkinson,  Illinois.
sentences.chinese: 與伊利諾伊州阿肯森市一家播種場的種植工人交談。

sentences.english: Clinton ended up carrying Illinois, then a tossup state.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓拿下了當時懸而未決的伊利諾伊州。

sentences.english: Illinois politics were upended by then-Gov.
sentences.chinese: 伊利諾伊州的政治顛覆了由當時的州長。
西北大學位於伊利諾伊州埃文斯敦。

sentences.english: He has served in the Illinois Legislature and worked as an intermediate-school teacher.
sentences.chinese: 此前他曾在伊利諾伊州議會任職，並曾擔任中學教師。

sentences.english: We are located in Southern Walworth County very close to the Illinois border.
sentences.chinese: 這個小鎮位於南沃爾沃思縣，緊挨著伊利諾伊州邊界。

sentences.english: A woman from Illinois recently walked on the Hi Line.
sentences.chinese: 最近，來自伊利諾伊州的女人走進高線。

sentences.english: There are 799 public libraries in Illinois.
sentences.chinese: 伊利諾伊州有799家公共圖書館。
